summary: AuthGate.tsx was updated to use /assets/generated/login-logo.dim_512x512.jpeg with alt text "Login logo", but the diff shows no new static asset added under frontend/public/assets/generated. The diff summary also indicates unrelated UI/feature changes (including an AppShell header logo update) that were explicitly out of scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the user-uploaded image file (WhatsApp-Image-2020-10-24-at-11.11.10-PM-2.jpeg) to frontend/public/assets/generated as a properly sized login/sign-in logo image, and ensure it is the only image used on the login/sign-in screen.
missing_requirements.reason: No new files were added in the diff, and there is no evidence of a new generated asset being created under frontend/public/assets/generated derived from the provided JPEG.
evidence: frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.tsx (references /assets/generated/login-logo.dim_512x512.jpeg but does not add it)
